GK16dkavy1pu:7: idam andhaṃ tamaḥ kṛtsnaṃ jāyeta bhuvanatrayam /
GK16dkavy1pu:8: yadi śabdāhvayaṃ jyotir āsaṃsāraṃ na dīpyate // 1.4 //
GK16dkavy1pu:10: teṣām asaṃnidhāne 'pi na svayaṃ paśya naśyati // 1.5 //
GK16dkavy1pu:11: gaur gauḥ kāmadughā samyak prayuktā smaryate budhaiḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:12: duṣprayuktā punar gotvaṃ prayoktuḥ saiva śaṃsati // 1.6 //
GK16dkavy1pu:13: tad alpam api nopekṣyaṃ kāvye duṣṭaṃ kathaṃ cana /
GK16dkavy1pu:14: syād vapuḥ sundaram api śvitreṇaikena durbhagam // 1.7 //
GK16dkavy1pu:19: taiḥ śarīraṃ ca kāvyānām alaṃkārāś ca darśitāḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:21: padyaṃ gadyaṃ ca miśraṃ ca tat tridhaiva vyavasthitam /
GK16dkavy1pu:22: padyaṃ catuṣpadī tac ca vṛttaṃ jātir iti dvidhā // 1.11 //
GK16dkavy1pu:24: sā vidyā naus vivikṣūṇāṃ gambhīraṃ kāvyasāgaram // 1.12 //
GK16dkavy1pu:25: muktakaṃ kulakaṃ kośaḥ saṃghāta iti tādṛśaḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:28: āśīr namaskriyā vastu- nirdeśo vāpi tanmukham // 1.14 //
GK16dkavy1pu:39: nyūnam apy atra yaiḥkaiścid aṅgaiḥ kāvyaṃ na duṣyati /
GK16dkavy1pu:41: guṇataḥ prāg upanyasya nāyakaṃ tena vidviṣām /
GK16dkavy1pu:44: tajjayān nāyakotkarṣa- varṇanaṃ ca dhinoti naḥ // 1.22 //
GK16dkavy1pu:46: iti tasya prabhedau dvau tayor ākhyāyikā kila // 1.23 //
GK16dkavy1pu:49: api tv aniyamo dṛṣṭas tatrāpy anyair udīraṇāt /
GK16dkavy1pu:50: anyo vaktā svayaṃ veti kīdṛg vā bhedalakṣaṇam // 1.25 //
GK16dkavy1pu:51: vaktraṃ cāparavaktraṃ ca socchvāsatvaṃ ca bhedakam /
GK16dkavy1pu:52: cihnam ākhyāyikāyāś cet prasaṅgena kathāsv api // 1.26 //
GK16dkavy1pu:54: bhedaś ca dṛṣṭo lambādir ucchvāso vāstu kiṃ tataḥ // 1.27 //
GK16dkavy1pu:60: mukham iṣṭārthasaṃsiddhyai kiṃ hi na syāt kṛtātmanām // 1.30 //
GK16dkavy1pu:63: tad etad vāṅmayaṃ bhūyaḥ saṃskṛtaṃ prākṛtaṃ tathā /
GK16dkavy1pu:64: apabhraṃśaś ca miśraṃ cety āhur āryāś caturvidham // 1.32 //
GK16dkavy1pu:65: saṃskṛtaṃ nāma daivī vāg anvākhyātā maharṣibhiḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:69: śaurasenī ca gauḍī ca lāṭī cānyā ca tādṛśī /
GK16dkavy1pu:70: yāti prākṛtam ity evaṃ vyavahāreṣu saṃnidhim // 1.35 //
GK16dkavy1pu:78: śravyam eveti saiṣāpi dvayī gatir udāhṛtā // 1.39 //
GK16dkavy1pu:79: asty aneko girāṃ mārgaḥ sūkṣmabhedaḥ parasparam /
GK16dkavy1pu:83: iti vaidarbhamārgasya prāṇā daśa guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:105: madhuraṃ rasavad vāci vastuny api rasasthitiḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:108: yayā kayācic chrutyā yat samānam anubhūyate /
GK16dkavy1pu:110: eṣa rājā yadā lakṣmīṃ prāptavān brahmaṇapriyaḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:112: itīdaṃ nādṛtaṃ gauḍair anuprāsas tu tatpriyaḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:113: anuprāsād api prāyo vaidarbhair idam iṣyate // 1.54 //
GK16dkavy1pu:114: varṇāvṛttir anuprāsaḥ pādeṣu ca padeṣu ca /
GK16dkavy1pu:118: cāru candramasaṃ bhīru bimbaṃ paśyaitad ambare /
GK16dkavy1pu:121: na tu rāmāmukhāmbhoja- sadṛśaś candramā iti // 1.58 //
GK16dkavy1pu:122: smaraḥ kharaḥ khalaḥ kāntaḥ kāyaḥ kopaś ca naḥ kṛśaḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:123: cyuto māno 'dhiko rāgo moho jāto 'savo gatāḥ // 1.59 //
GK16dkavy1pu:124: ity ādi bandhapāruṣyaṃ śaithilyaṃ ca nigacchati /
GK16dkavy1pu:128: tat tu naikāntamadhuram ataḥ paścād vidhāsyate // 1.61 //
GK16dkavy1pu:130: kāmaṃ sarvo 'py alaṃkāro rasam arthe niṣañcati /
GK16dkavy1pu:132: kanye kāmayamānaṃ māṃ na tvaṃ kāmayase katham /
GK16dkavy1pu:139: duṣpratītikaraṃ grāmyaṃ yathā yā bhavataḥ priyā // 1.66 //
GK16dkavy1pu:140: kharaṃ prahṛtya viśrāntaḥ puruṣo vīryavān iti /
GK16dkavy1pu:141: evam ādi na śaṃsanti mārgayor ubhayor api // 1.67 //
GK16dkavy1pu:151: dīptam ity aparair bhūmnā kṛcchrodyam api badhyate /
GK16dkavy1pu:152: nyakṣeṇa kṣayitaḥ pakṣaḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ kṣaṇād iti // 1.72 //
GK16dkavy1pu:158: nedṛśaṃ bahu manyate mārgayor ubhayor api /
GK16dkavy1pu:161: utkarṣavān guṇaḥ kaścid yasminn ukte pratīyate /
GK16dkavy1pu:163: arthināṃ kṛpaṇā dṛṣṭis tvanmukhe patitā sakṛt /
GK16dkavy1pu:164: tadavasthā punar deva nānyasya mukham īkṣate // 1.77 //
GK16dkavy1pu:165: iti tyāgasya vākye 'sminn utkarṣaḥ sādhu lakṣyate /
GK16dkavy1pu:167: ślāghyair viśeṣaṇair yuktam udāraṃ kaiścid iṣyate /
GK16dkavy1pu:176: iti padye 'pi paurastyā badhnanty ojasvinīr giraḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:177: anye tv anākulaṃ hṛdyam icchanty ojo girāṃ yathā // 1.83 //
GK16dkavy1pu:179: kasya kāmāturaṃ ceto vāruṇī na kariṣyati // 1.84 //
GK16dkavy1pu:182: tac ca vārttābhidhāneṣu varṇanāsv api dṛśyate // 1.85 //
GK16dkavy1pu:183: gṛhāṇi nāma tāny eva taporāśir bhavādṛśaḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:190: yo 'rthas tenāti tuṣyanti vidagdhā netare janāḥ // 1.89 //
GK16dkavy1pu:195: idam atyuktir ity uktam etad gauḍopalālitam /
GK16dkavy1pu:196: prasthānaṃ prākpraṇītaṃ tu sāram anyasya vartmanaḥ // 1.92 //
GK16dkavy1pu:199: samyag ādhīyate yatra sa samādhiḥ smṛto yathā // 1.93 //
GK16dkavy1pu:206: iti hṛdyam ahṛdyaṃ tu niḥṣṭhīvati vadhūr iti /
GK16dkavy1pu:207: yugapan naikadharmāṇām adhyāsaś ca smṛto yathā // 1.97 //
GK16dkavy1pu:212: tad etat kāvyasarvasvaṃ samādhir nāma yo guṇaḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:215: tadbhedās tu na śakyante vaktuṃ pratikavi sthitāḥ // 1.101 //
GK16dkavy1pu:217: tathāpi na tad ākhyātuṃ sarasvatyāpi śakyate // 1.102 //
GK16dkavy1pu:218: naisargikī ca pratibhā śrutaṃ ca bahu nirmalam /
GK16dkavy1pu:220: na vidyate yady api pūrvavāsanā- guṇānubandhi pratibhānam adbhutam /
GK16dkavy1pu:221: śrutena yatnena ca vāg upāsitā dhruvaṃ karoty eva kamapy anugraham //
GK16dkavy1pu:222: tad astatandrair aniśaṃ sarasvatī śramād upāsyā khalu kīrtim īpsubhiḥ /
GK16dkavy1pu:223: kṛśe kavitve 'pi janāḥ kṛtaśramāḥ vidagdhagoṣṭhīṣu vihartum īśate // 1.105
GK16dkavy1pu:224: // iti kāvyādarśe mārgavibhāgo nāma prathamaḥ paricchedaḥ //
